select ret.regdate AS regdate , sal.sales_nm AS sales_nm , ret.return_cnt AS return_cnt , (sal.price*ret.return_cnt) AS avg , ret.confirmYN AS confirmYN , user.client AS client , ret.confirm_requestYN AS confirm_requestYN
from tb_returndir ret join tb_refundinfo reinfo ON reinfo.rfinfo_id = ret.rfinfo_id join tb_purchaseinfo pinfo ON pinfo.purinf_id = reinfo.purinf_id join tb_sales sal ON sal.sales_id = pinfo.sales_id join tb_userinfo user ON pinfo.loginID = user.loginID
and (ret.regdate >= #{datesearch1} and ret.regdate <= (select date_add(date_format(#{datesearch2}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)) )
and user.client Like CONCAT('%', #{searchinput}, '%')
LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
